title: Facebook reels playback controls
content: Does anyone know of a way or an extension for firefox that allows playback controls on facebook reels on desktop? Thanks
creator: majet512

title: Suddenly I am logged out of all my sessions and cant find my details in saved logins
content:
Hi community, sorry if I didnt use the right category but I am having serious issue right now.

Just few minutes ago, I was suddenly logged out of all my sessions and my saved logins disappeared.

All my accounts use randomly generated passwords by firefox, there is no way I can recover any of this without getting my saved logins back.

What should I do? I am freaking out
creator: arianinaction

title: security/hacked account
content: Someone has hacked my Firefox and Gmail account. S.ramos217@gmail.com I was able to login and change the password but now am being kicked out and prompted to verify with my Gmail that has also been hacked please help

title: Did a refresh but cannot get open my home page @ Currently.com
content: There is a security message the website is not safe. I used the site just before I did the refresh. How can I correct the problem?
creator: 44Larry

title: Nest log on issues
content: I have been using Firefox to log on to Nest app for years. now it comes up with "something went wrong there, try again". I log right on with chrome.
creator: arrowhead82x

title: Video Plays Automatically When Opening Laptop
content:
If I pause a video (e.g. Hulu) in Firefox and close the lid on my laptop, that video will begin playing again automatically when I open my laptop again, even though I never pressed play. This happens whether Firefox is the foreground app or in the background.

Is this expected behavior? If not, how can it be turned off?

Thanks for your help.
creator: ScaryFlyer

title: My Firefox deletes my logins
content:
About every month or so Firefox decides to delete my login info and i have to relog everywhere again.

While this is not a critical issue, its a very annoying one.

My cookie settings are on standard, and the "Delete cookies and site data when Firefox is closed" square is unticked. I use Dashlane for my passwords but ive used it for a long time before on mozilla and other browsers and i've never had issues with it.
creator: nasko7897

title: Internet drops out using yahoo mail but only on email.
content: Sky is a satellite television firm in the UK it also does a Mobile Phone System and Broadband Internet access.They also do email run by Yahoo. It is nothing like Skype. Now and again on the email it tells me the internet has dropped while I am using it, The PC says its still connected and the modem lights are on. If I then use Google Chrome its OK. I am not using wifi as I am now wired. Although yahoo email says "not connected" other sites are working OK. This fault is Firefox and before the last maybe 6 updates it was OK. I have been with Sky about 25 years and been using Monzilla about at least 10 years. I always delete the cookies each day.
creator: jacksonce
